import React from 'react'; import '../style/Nav.css' function Nav() { const handleHighlight = ()=> { const nav_link = document.querySelectorAll('.nav-link'); document.querySelector('.specialClass')?.classList.remove('specialClass'); nav_link.classList.add('specialClass'); } return (

) } export default Nav;
